system.weapons:
Turret: Chem Cannon (40m; S/–/–; 2d10+5 E; Pen 9; Clip 100; Reload Full; Crippling [2], Felling [2], Spray, Toxic [4]). Creates 1d5 Metre Radius Toxic Cloud after firing, those who end turn inside are hit again and suffocate. Lasts 1d5 Turns.

Hull, one of: Front Facing Heavy Bolter, Heavy Flamer

Pintle (Optional), one of: Heavy Stubber, Storm Bolter

---

Heavy Bolter (150m, -/-/6, 1d10+8 X, Pen 5, Clip 60, Rld Full, Tearing)

Heavy Flamer (30m, S/-/-, 1d10+5 E, Pen 4, Clip 20, Rld 2 Full, Flame, Spray)

Heavy Stubber(100m, -/-/8, 1d10+4 I, Pen 3, Clip 80, Rld 2 Full)

Storm Bolter(90m, S/2/4, 1d10+4, Pen 4, Clip 60, Rld Full, Storm, Tearing)
system.specialRules:
Traits: Enclosed, Extremely Volatile, Enhanced Motive Systems, Reinforced Armour, Tracked Vehicle

Special Rules: If this vehicle explodes, replace flames with Toxic(3) Special Quality, Toxic Cloud lasts 1d5 Rounds, those who end their turn within suffer another hit and suffocate.
